person.persName: James Huffman (Pendleton County, Kentucky, laborer and farm worker.)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, laborer, farm laborer, and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda Cummins in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on February 1, 1849. Father of William H. Huffman, Thomas Hoffman, John W. Hoffman, Silvester Hoffman, Jasper N. Hoffman, and Franklin Hoffman. Laborer in Pendleton County in 1850. Farm laborer in Pendleton County in 1860. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1863.
